line_1: Do what you will, you cannot hatch a riot;
line_2: Believe me, Sir, you may as well be quiet,

line_1: The liberty to raise a mob or riot,
line_2: For spoil and plunder ne'er were got by quiet;

line_1: Then hail to Liberty, Reform, and Riot!
line_2: Adieu Contentment, Safety, Peace, and Quiet!

line_1: There free from noise and riot,
line_2: Each night get drunk in quiet.

line_1: Yet some think it strange they should make such a Riot
line_2: In a Place where sick Folk would be glad to be quiet,

line_1: That he, whose wishes breed no riot,
"Shall dare to aid this lawless Riot:
